text: Tech tip of the day: Always back up your code!
Tech tip of the day: Use meaningful commit messages!
Tech tip of the day: Keep your dependencies up to date!
Tech tip of the day: Write tests for your code!
Tech tip of the day: Document your code well!
Tech tip of the day: Use a linter to catch errors early!
Tech tip of the day: Refactor your code regularly!
Tech tip of the day: Learn to use debugging tools effectively!
Tech tip of the day: Collaborate with others to improve your code!
